problem.markdown:
Run a Validation Rule analysis for National from 1st July to the 30th September for Maternal health. >>How many validation rule violations are there? (2 attempts)<<
( ) A. 3 ( ) B. 231 ( ) C. 49 (x) D. 8
[explanation] 8 is the correct answer. [explanation]
